XData.name: KPI
XData.Description: Этот блок XData содержит определение KPI
XData.Data:
<kpi xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee/kpi" name="TrainingStudentsKPI" sourceType="sql" caption="TrainingStudentsKPI" sql="" > <property name="FullName" displayName="FullName" columnNo="1"/> <property name="Company" displayName="Company" columnNo="2"/> <property name="Email" displayName="Email" columnNo="3"/>
<filter name="Training" displayName="Training" filterProperty=""/> </kpi>

Method.name: %OnGetSQL
Method.Description: Return an SQL statement to execute.

XData.name: sql
XData.Data: <xml><![CDATA[ SELECT Students->LastName->Value || ' ' || SUBSTRING(Students->FirstName->Value,1,1) || '. ' || SUBSTRING(ISNULL(Students->MiddleName->Value,''),1,1) || '. ' As FullName, Students->Company->ShortName->Value As Company, Students->Email FROM Stc_Data.SubGroup_Students WHERE SubGroup IN (SELECT SubGroups FROM Stc_Data.Training_SubGroups WHERE Training = :trainingId) ORDER BY Company, FullName ]]></xml>
